item.title: Labels and Selectors
item.description: Labels Labels are key/value pairs that are attached to objects, such as pods that help to identify that object. Selectors Label Selectors help client/user identify a set of objects. spec: selector: matchLabels: app: mysql strategy: type: Recreate template: metadata: labels: app: mysql Demo Create labels & use selector to identify set of objects
